title: 3.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
◼ Create a web page named Music is Life.
◼ Choose the title Music for the web page.
◼ Set the background color of the web page to pink.
◼ Enter the text on the web page in a paragraph format, describing the importance of music.
◼ Choose font size 6, font face Times New Roman, and font color red for the text Music.
◼ Choose font size 4, font face Cooper Black, and font color blue for sub-headings.
◼ Choose font size 3, font face Arial and font color green for the text written under the various sub-headings.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
